title: Remove QR-based custom credit cards and scanner flow from POS UI

requirements.summary: Remove the Cards tab and ensure the Custom Credit Cards screen is no longer reachable from the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The top-level tabs no longer include a "Cards" tab.
Navigating the app does not render CustomCreditCardsScreen anywhere.
The tab layout (e.g., grid columns) is updated so spacing/alignment remains correct.

file_operations.description: Remove the "Cards" tab trigger and the associated TabsContent rendering CustomCreditCardsScreen; remove the CustomCreditCardsScreen import; update the TabsList grid column count so tab spacing/alignment remains correct.

requirements.summary: Revert CheckoutDialog to remove the QR Credit Card payment method and eliminate the in-app QR scanner flow.
acceptanceCriteria: The payment method list in CheckoutDialog does not show "QR Credit Card".
CheckoutDialog does not render QRCardPaymentPanel and does not attempt to start/stop camera scanning.
Completing a purchase works using the remaining payment methods (e.g., Fake Cash and Gift Card) without referencing QR/card token validation.

file_operations.description: Remove the QR-based payment method option from the payment method RadioGroup; remove QRCardPaymentPanel rendering and all QR/card validation flow (including useCustomCreditCards usage and any scanner start/stop logic); simplify state and error handling to support only remaining methods (e.g., cash and gift card) and ensure completing a purchase still works. This change removes usage of the selected qr-code/camera capabilities (scanner hooks); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Delete unused QR/custom-card modules and clean up imports so the frontend build no longer references QR/scanner or Google Charts QR generation.
acceptanceCriteria: No remaining imports/reference usages of useCustomCreditCards, QRCodeBadge, CustomCreditCardsScreen, or QRCardPaymentPanel from active app code paths.
The frontend TypeScript build completes without unused/failed import errors related to removed QR/custom-card modules.
No network requests are made to the Google Charts QR code URL from the running app.

file_operations.description: Delete the QR-card payment panel module that embeds the QR scanner/manual token flow (removes usage of the selected qr-code scanner capability); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Delete the Custom Credit Cards screen module so it cannot be referenced or bundled.
Delete the QRCodeBadge module that generates QR images via Google Charts to ensure the app no longer makes requests to the Google Charts QR code URL.
Delete the custom credit card hook module; ensure no remaining active imports/reference usages.
Confirm all imports/usages of CustomCreditCardsScreen are removed so there are no remaining references from active app code paths.
Remove imports and any remaining references to QRCardPaymentPanel and useCustomCreditCards so TypeScript builds cleanly without missing/unused import errors.
